page.title: 10 PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: At the moment in our area the favourite playground games are football and cricket for the boys and 'french elastic' for the girls. 'French elastic' is when you put a piece of elastic around two peoples ankles. Then you jump on to the elastic and make up a sequence. The next person has to do the same sequence. If they make a mistake, it is the next persons go. During the winter the most popular game with both boys and girls is 'pom_pom'. In 'pom_pom' one person is 'on' and the rest go away and hide. After the person who is on counts to a certain number they have to start to look for you. While they are looking you have to try and reach the 'pom_pom' post before they see you and get there first.
